The only issue  was the shower that leaked onto the bathroom floor, but we were given several extra towels to absorb the water until it could be repaired. We were impressed with the hot breakfast and automated plastic glove dispenser for sanitary use of serving utensils.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your stay. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport and we hope to have a future opportunity to welcome you back again.

Summary: Hotel was fully staffed with 2-3 working the front desk. Management was very hands on and attentive with guests interactions.   Breakfast started at 630a weekdays and 7a weekends. Full hot and cold items were available. Breakfast host did a great job.   Rooms were very clean and great shower pressure. Laundry on 7th floor was 2.50/1.50 using quarters. 3 washer and dryers each.   Parking garage in rear with plenty of space. Minor complaint would be for the hotel to check the pans in rooms with kitchens. Two had very deep scratches into the metal making it unusable. Also, king size pillows for king beds would be nice. Small pillows did not allow for a good nights sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hotel staff is really friendly and the hotel room is very nice and clean.  The staff also respects your wishes if you do not want housekeeping.  Walls are not thin so you can sleep peacefully.  The kitchen is really nice with cups, plates, bowls, cooking utensils, cookware, toaster, microwave, fridge, and stove.  I love cooking so this is awesome for me!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide your review and feedback. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport and we hope we can welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Checked into the hotel around 1PM. The checkin was quick and room was nice and clean. The hotel is located besides the main street, which is wide and easy to access. The outside is not large, but nice and clean with bamboo trees. There is also swimming pool, but we did not use. Good service and breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your review. We appreciate your feedback and Thank you for staying with us. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I stayed here the night before a flight to Maine. I was done with Ubers, trains, and buses, and after a month of traveling around California I needed a good night's sleep before flights, which are hell these days. Check in was friendly and easy. I put down the blackout shades and had a great night's sleep in the comfortable king-sized bed. Complimentary breakfast was delicious and I left happy.  One of the biggest perks of this hotel is that they drive you to your airport in a van. Call 24 hours ahead to schedule the ride to make it easier for both you and administration. Due to hotel policy, they cannot drop you off directly at your airline, but the driver was really friendly and I was just a short walk away from my terminal.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. We are glad you enjoyed your visit and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Most of our activity was away from the hotel but we DID have a fairly large breakfast gathering that went through late morning. Wait staff was more than cordial and helpful, keeping water glasses ful and removing dishes and such - very friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you staying with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The Hyatt House Irvine is a good hotel near the airport and close to other areas.  The rooms are somewhat poorly designed, extra large bathrooms, but a closet less than 2 feet from the side of the bed, and limited light throughout the room.  However, the staff, especially the breakfast staff are lovely and the front desk staff are accommodating.  Overall a fine place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: It's a very nice, clean property. The associates are all very friendly, polite and helpful.  It was a short staycation with a little work involved haha!!  I asked the Front Desk if I could get a late check out due to a 1pm zoom meeting and they were able to accommodate me no problem.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. It appears your stay went well so perhaps the score was just a typo. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: They're are 4 other hotels near by that I visited. Hilton charge for breakfast. Embassy housekeeping visits were below standard. I had to switch rooms because my room was not turned over and I watched wine glasses sit outside a room for 2 days. Embassy breakfast is a small window of opportunity but they do make omelets to order. Sonesta only has 1 microwave per floor which is not sanitary in times of Covid so I didn't even bother checking in. Marriott was a bit overpriced. Hyatt House is like a mini vacation. They have studio rooms with a full kitchen stocked with dishes. Motion sensors on the bathroom lights. Free wifi. Embassy and Hilton wifi was not free. Hyatt House has a gym, pool, and free shuttle to the airport. All hotels charge for parking and Hyatt House is $18 a day.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking time to write your review about your experience at our hotel. We sincerely appreciated it and are glad you enjoyed your stay. We are hopeful to return our omelet station again sometime in the future and are glad that you found our hotel to be a better fit for your travel accommodations. Thank you for staying with us. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future.

Summary: An incredible stay with a complete kitchen, nice view & all utensils and such that could be needed. Staff was very friendly & kind. Rooms & amenities were better than anticipated! A great and comfy place to stay especially after a long day out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Nice place to stay when visiting friends and family. Would stay here again. Free breakfast was pretty good too. Hotel is very new, with led lighting, clean new rooms, and nice shower/baths. We would stay again. Also pretty close to grocery store.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the comments and feedback and we Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Been to a lot of hotels, this one was one of the better ones. Room and hotel was clean, staff is excellent, bed is comfy. The *only* complaint is the cost of parking. That should be included. The breakfast was better than typical waffles and cereal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback regarding your stay. We're glad your stay went well and we hope to welcome you back again in the future.

Summary Heading: good stay and close to airport
Summary: Studio room with sofa bed fairly comfortable and clean, good in room coffee maker/coffee, swiveling TV allows you to watch either from bed or sofa. Nice eating area for complimentary breakfast - hotel also provides option to purchase dinner. All this and only 10 minutes away from JW Airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Convenient, friendly staff and reasonable prices. Great to see staff wear mask but a lot of guest do not. Not sure if it is required but would like to see more guest wear mask and limit the number of guest in the elevators.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback you provided and we hope to have a future opportunity to welcome you back again.

Summary: This is my go to hotel when I am in Irvine.  The rates are very reasonable, the rooms are clean, the hotel is conveniently located, the breakfast buffet is good and the staff are wonderful - especially Zafir who welcomed us like family!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide your review. We're glad you enjoyed your stay and we hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Our favorite hotel/ we bring our dog
Summary: hotel entrance driveway has a small park with lots of shade and benches to walk your dog. Heated swimming pool , so you can swim year round and a workout area. Everyday complimentary excellent coffees and teas and hot or cold breakfast. We have stayed here many times every year since they opened. We recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport for your travel accommodations.

Summary: My room was clean, spacious and lovely. All staff were friendly and accommodating. Great breakfast buffet and plenty of options for food delivery close by. Highly recommend - I will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and feedback. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: 18.00 compared to up to 30.00 or more at other SNA properties  Don’t order the trio salsa and chips as the trio is a frozen packaged tasteless dipping that you should pass on breakfast was good but the same thing every day they do have plastic glove system but no one sees it because it’s inside with the foodSpace I would suggest it be put out in the front where people enter otherwise it’s useless
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to have a future opportunity to welcome you back again..

Summary: Solid, dependable Hyatt House in Irvine. This is our 3rd stay here and we’ve always had consistent service. Tommy at the front desk was very helpful in assigning our rooms next together even though we booked last minute.   It’s a midrange Hyatt but Globalists still get parking waived on award stays and 4pm checkout if needed.   I liked the touch less plastic glove dispenser in the breakfast area. I wish there were more grab and go items packaged for guests who wish to take food back to their rooms and don’t want to sit among unmasked diners in the eating area (don’t fully agree with the honor system and have a hard time believing everyone who is unmasked is vaccinated).   Pet fee is $75 and there’s plenty of grass in the adjacent office park for your furry family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your return visit to our hotel and we hope we can welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I was in desperate need of a room at 9:00pm. My first thought if choice was the Hyatt. It was better than I expected. I would stay again in the future. Oh yeah, they have a delicious breakfast that comes with the room. Delicious and a lot to choose from.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're pleased that our breakfast was to your satisfaction and we appreciate you choosing Hyatt. We hope we can welcome you back again in the future.

Summary Heading: Checking in our niece into UC Irvine
Summary: Hotel was perfectly located near John Wayne airport and UC Irvine. Many shops and eateries near by. $19 self park fee is very reasonable in LA which can be anywhere from $45-60 per night. Breakfast was adequate- had many options and coffee was hot and strong. Simple and efficient property. staff gave great service. I would return and stay at this property. Be aware Irvine is a bustling area- hard to get dinner res and accommodated at restaurants, especially good ones in high demand. What's with the no res, sign in, and wait 1-2-3+ hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate all of the feedback you provided and are glad you enjoyed your visit.

Summary: Hotel and staff was very responsive and very nice people. Hotel was extremely great and staff cares your needs. My family loves to stays again and again. I really appreciate the staff and near to all vacation spots
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport.

Summary: Haven't been to this property for a few years and it is in great shape, no signs of wear and tear. Staff is friendly and helpful. Great location. Only suggestion is that they consider changing the beds. Ours in a king den room was comfortable, but on its last leg. Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will look into the issue with the King bed and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.

Summary: This is a great hotel in a fantastic OC location. We stayed for a week with two young children and the suite layout worked well. The hotel was very clean and accommodating. Do note you are forced to pay and self park - no valet and no free parking is available. It is also a pet friendly hotel, and while our room was very clean, there will be animals around the facility.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Very clean, very friendly staff. We've stayed here twice. I tiny bit about our budget but absolutely worth it. Clean and friendly is all we need. We love staying here. Asked for extra towels and they were brought up to the room so quickly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the time you took to provide it and we thank you for choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport for your travel accommodations. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel and staff are great.  We stayed previously at another similar type hotel and were largely impressed by the Hyatt House.  I also like that there is a parking garage to help keep your car a little cooler in the summer months.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay. We appreciate you staying with us and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great stay, fantastic property in convenient location, wonderful staff
Summary: Thank you to Letice and staff for making our family (including 2 under 2) feel so welcome at Hyatt House. We will be back again and again I'm sure!  Everything clean, great breakfast, very good and functional rooms. One elevator was down, that was the only negative, but I'm sure that happens everywhere.  Stay HERE if you go to OC with a family in tow.

Summary: This location is up to standard with other Hyatt House locations - clean and comfortable. What stands out here is how friendly the staff was. Every single person I came in contact with made me feel welcomed and appreciated.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport. We're glad to hear our staff members made you feel welcome and appreciated. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Everything was wonderful. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the staff was friendly and the area was beautiful. The location is minutes away from a lot of things. The bed was soft and I felt at home . I definitely recommend.

Summary: We stayed at this location over the July 4th weekend. The hotel was clean, quiet and had an amazing bed.   There was a grass area that was perfect for walking our fur baby . We also found restaurants and a grocery store just a couple of blocks away. We enjoyed a perfect stay. We’ll be back for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.

Summary: Room clean, staff helpful. Everything was up to my satisfaction. Great customer service. Location was near shops, restaurants and the beach. Staff is knowledgeable. My stay was great. I will definitely stay at Hyatt again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide your review and feedback. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport for your travel accommodations and hope we can welcome you back again soon.

Summary: So dirty and so expensive it’s was unreal . I’m  questioning if was ever even  cleaned at all? So covered in crud. I mean and the price was ridiculous, no way will I ever waste my money again on this place!
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you feel our hotel was as you described. We appreciate the comments you provided and will be sure to share them with our staff members to ensure all aspects of our hotel are meeting our cleanliness standard.

Summary Heading: Good Hotel ... BUT, make sure it fits with your trip
Summary: The hotel is great. The rooms at Hyatt House are perfect, and the amenities the hotel offers are great. Breakfast, clean hotel, lots of space, and great rooms. I think the main issue with the hotel is just make sure that this fits your trip. First, you may not necessarily need the amenities that Hyatt House provides. For example, the full kitchen, island/desk. Second, the location may not be ideal for you. The beaches are still a bit of a trek via ride share/your own car, and some of the entertainment in the area (Disney/Angels/etc.) is a bit far compared to other hotels. Just make sure this hotel is what you need in terms of the location/amenities. If it checks both of those boxes off for you, then you will not be disappointed here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to provide your review. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport and we hope you are able to visit again soon.

Summary: Stayed here with my family while we were in transition for our house to be ready for us to move in the staff was amazing and helped get my family moved into another room faster rather than have us wait
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and for staying with us. We are glad to have had the opportunity and we hope we can welcome you again in the future.

Summary Heading: My go to spot to stay in Irvine
Summary: Great staff and ideal location for visiting Irvine. Shopping and UC Irvine 10-15 minutes drive. Irvine isn’t a city for walking and the hotel is located in a business park like area. I’ll be staying here when I’m back in Irvine.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to provide your review. We appreciate your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: I only planned on staying for a certain amount of time but due to unforeseen circumstances I had to extend my stay a few times. They were more than accommodating… I never had to change rooms. Not having to lug all things including my puppies (and all of their things) was really nice. There is a really nice grass area for puppies to run around right in front. And staff was so friendly & helpful! I would definitely recommend if you are in the area to stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope we see you again in the near future.

Summary: The single bedroom suite was clean. It has a kitchenette complete with full-sized refrigerator and utensils! I just didnt like dogs being allowed in the hotel. May I just suggest ti the hitrk management that bathroom supplies like shampoo and conditioner be sufficient enough for the guests. I was expecting that there was lotion, but there was none.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and we appreciate your feedback. We are always happy to supply additional toiletries such as shampoo and conditioner upon request. Lotion is available upon request as well however is not something that is pre-placed inside our guest rooms. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope we are able to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Hyatt is beautiful but the staff at the Hyatt House Irvine are the gem of this property.  It's a great location near the airport, shopping and beaches.  The staff are very helpful and welcoming.  I recommend to anyone who would like a home like atmosphere and friendly helpful employees who care.  My sister lost her husband and she stayed with me. The staff was very kind to her.  She told me she was so grateful because she could sleep well. The beds and pillows are very comfortable  I am grateful for all of it.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review and feedback. We will be sure to pass this along to the team. Thank you as well for staying with us. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Aesthetically, it was nice. But for the price, I expected a lot more. I noticed cup stains on a seat in my room & found a sticky residue on one of the trash bins, which means they don’t thoroughly clean or at least wipe down the rooms (especially since we’re still in a pandemic). The breakfast was very disappointing considering I paid extra for it. They weren’t even checking room numbers for 3 days so anyone could’ve walked up to get it. There was confusion at some point amongst staff so they need to improve on communication within their team. I’m just glad I had a place to stay for the week while on business.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'm sorry to learn that there were some issues during your stay and we will be certain to take your comments back to our team members to continue to improve upon our guest services.

Summary: Front desk manager Zafar was very rude and was very reluctant to help when me and my coworkers asked him a question. They’re  stingy with the free breakfast. For what I paid I expected better service. Not worth the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your stay. I'm sorry to hear that one of our associates was not helpful during your stay. We will be certain to share your review with him to ensure he is providing a better service experience for our guests. Additionally I'm sorry that your room was not serviced during your stay. As your stay was two nights we would typically provide service every 4th day unless requested otherwise. If you specifically requested service and it was not properly relayed by one of our staff members I apologize for the inconvenience and we will be sure to address this with our entire team. Our breakfast is still evolving due to the current Covid restrictions and guidance and we are hopeful that the breakfast buffet that we had pre-Covid will again return soon. Thank you for bringing these items to our attention so that we can continue to improve upon our guest services.

Summary: I don't like traveling very much because I'm never as comfortable when I travel than I am when I'm in my own home. This was my first time staying in a Hyatt House however and omg I am never going back to staying in a regular hotel again. The bed was clean and comfortable, the decor and furniture was modern and comfortable- but beyond that there's something so comforting and homey about having a small living room and full kitchen in your room that makes me feel right at home. My dogs loved it too! It was surprisingly affordable too. For people with travel anxiety like me, I HIGHLY recommend Hyatt House.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review. We are glad you enjoyed your experience at our hotel and appreciate you choosing Hyatt House for your future travel accommodations. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My sisters and I only stay there for a night, but in that time, we experience pleasant interactions with the staff, they were very accommodating, helpful and nice. We felt that the room exceeded expectations in cleanliness and comfort.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport and we hope to welcome you back again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Most expensive does NOT mean first class service or stay.
Summary: I had two rooms in less than 36 hours and both rooms were absolutely horrid. There was no guideline or restriction for COVID-19 cleanliness and let me tell you that I was beyond disappointed and disgusted with the things I saw in my rooms. By John Wayne airport they are the most expensive hotel but by far the worst experience I’ve ever had at any 3.5-star hotel in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing our Guest Survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Summary Heading: Great Hotel , Great Location , Highly Recommended

Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back again.

Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and for choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This hotel was clean and the staff was friendly  from checking in to checkout, I didn’t care much for the pool because it’s behind the building, but overall the stay was great, my family had a great time.

Summary: very good dog friendly hotel as we were on repatriation returning home country with our dogs the stays in the hotel was a great experience and we can recommend to any of the colleagues in my company especially under the special condition of COVID.

Summary Heading: Exceeds Cleanliness and Safety during Covid-19

Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that our cleaning and safety measures provided you with a comfortable environment for your stay. We appreciate you choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport and hope to welcome you back again in the near future.

Summary: I stayed here after losing my home and everything I own to a house fire in the middle of the night. I stayed for 3 weeks and wish I could’ve stayed longer. The staff was welcoming and went the extra mile to make me and me pet feel comfortable. Thank you guys! I will definitely keep you in mind for future stays and visitors
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your review. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay and sorry that you had to stay on such an unfortunate event. We hope to welcome you back again in the future under much better circumstances.  Thank you for choosing Hyatt House Irvine/John Wayne Airport.

Summary: I have traveling across 6 continents being a globalist, not many hotel I can say have WOW my experience, Hyatt house Irvine have definetely delivered that by providing an alternative bottled water for my stay as I am allergic with the one provided by Hyatt standard. The entire staff and management genuinely make you feel welcome and home during your stay

Summary: I have stayed in this hotel for a couple of times. 2-3 nights each stay. It's super clean, friendly services staff. Highly recommended. The only thing I'd mention is that they charge a $18 fee for self parking.
